sourcesContent:
<template>
    <div ref="gantt" class="container" />
</template>
<script>
import { gantt } from 'dhtmlx-gantt'
export default {
    mounted() {
        // 初始化
        gantt.init(this.$refs.gantt)
        // 解析数据
        gantt.parse(this.$props.tasks)

    },
    created(){
        gantt.config.readonly = true
    }
}
</script>
